description.@en: Grey Vivimancers move through the folds of space-time, metabolising Wytchstone at an immeasurably chaotic rate.

effect.@en: Whenever you are under the effects of Wytchstone Essence, reduce the number of AP to cast Magick spells of your Covenant by 1. In addition, you never suffer from the ill-effects of using multiple ampules of Wytchblight.
